casebody.data:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Scott Philip SIGMAN. No. D-2729. Supreme Court of the United States June 17, 2013.

Scott Philip Sigman, of Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be *2848disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
